entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 11:18 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
